  • Method Details

    • showSpecies

      public String showSpecies(int show)
      Description:
      Parameters:
      show - int number of the chosen option
      Returns:
      msg String Depending on the option chosen, a message will be displayed with all the species recorded, with the fauna species recorded or with the flora species recorded.

    • registerSpeciesFauna

      public boolean registerSpeciesFauna(String speciesName, String scientificName, boolean isMigratory, double maxWeigth)
      Parameters:
      speciesName - String species name
      scientificName - String scientific name of the species
      isMigratory - boolean whether it is (true) or not (false) a migratory species
      maxWeigth - double maximum weight of the fauna species
      Returns:
      true boolean whether the species of fauna could be successfully recorded

    • registerSpeciesFlora

      public boolean registerSpeciesFlora(String speciesName, String scientificName, boolean hasFlowers, boolean hasFruits, double maxHeigth)
      Parameters:
      speciesName - String species name
      scientificName - String scientific name of the species
      hasFlowers - boolean whether it has (true) or not(false) flowers
      hasFruits - boolean whether it has (true) or not(false) fruits
      maxHeigth - double maximum height of the species
      Returns:
      true boolean if the species was successfully registered

    • deleteSpecies

      public boolean deleteSpecies(String speciesName)
      Parameters:
      speciesName - String name of the species to be removed
      Returns:
      true boolean if the species was successfully eliminated

    • editSpeciesFauna

      public boolean editSpeciesFauna(int optionToModify, String newCharacteristic, String speciesName)
      Parameters:
      optionToModify - int data to be modified
      newCharacteristic - String the new data
      speciesName - String name of the species for which this data is to be edited
      Returns:
      true boolean whether the characteristic belonging to that species could be successfully modified

    • editSpeciesFlora
